name: MeditationMusic
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation music
des:
The Meditation Music sleep aid is brought to you by one of the world’s top sleep and relaxation artists. This ultra premium sound is taken directly from the album “Meditation Music” which is used by thousands to aid in sleep and relaxation each night. Now, for the first time, the relaxation power of Meditation Music is available on your Alexa device. Meditation Music is specifically engineered to help you get to and stay asleep by using a custom equalized recording of real Meditation Music. 

HOW TO USE: To use Meditation Music: Say “Alexa, Play Meditation Music” Once running, Meditation Music will automatically loop all night, or until you say 'Alexa, stop'. 

UNINTERUPTED PLAY: Meditation Music premium service includes all night play (2hr instead of 10min loops) and high quality sound.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
